txt.en: Cánnakh can be found in Aughaire.\n\nYou should speak with Cánnakh.
Foul, ancient evil from The Rift of Nûrz Ghâshu has made its way to the surface of Angmar, including Vélnas, who seeks a lost power buried somewhere in these lands.
Vélnas can be found somewhere in Angmar.\n\nYou should defeat Vélnas.

'Vélnas is a creature of nameless evil from an age that time forgot. They say that this creature can look right through you and into your deepest, darkest fears.\n\n'This seer of fear must be dealt with if we are to find this ancient power before anyone else. Are you up for the challenge?'

'A horrid creature such as this nameless abomination has no right to be walking above the ground. You have done much to hinder their efforts in locating this ancient power before I figure out where and what it is.\n\n'I will continue to pour over these old stories and maps.'
